subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The French cyclists, who must adhere to strict antidoping laws in their country, have won 6 of the 17 Tour de France stages so far.
snippet: The French cyclists, who must adhere to strict antidoping laws in their country, have won 6 of the 17 Tour de France stages so far.
